title: Lead .NET / Azure AI / Angular Dev
job_overview:
We're looking for a Upgrade to see actual info / Angular developer, experienced in working on Azure with DevOps, OpenAI and Microsoft Semantic Kernel. This is a senior position. You'll pick up this project independently. There's support from the wider team, but you're the lead / single dev for this project. The team is building an MVP, which is 80% finished. You'll need to pick this up and finish the project. 

When you apply - give us a detailed overview of similar Azure-based projects you have worked on. Let us know why you're a match for this position. This is a full-time position.

Must-have:
- Senior (5+ years) experience Upgrade to see actual info development
- Front-end experience using Angular
- Experienced in Azure DevOps and OpenAI
- Experience with Microsoft Semantic Kernel
- Ability to pick-up a new project quickly and work independently
- Near-fluent in English
- Values high quality code, high attention to detail
- Pragmatic and pro-active attitude, self-starter

Permanent Work From Home
Please send us the link of your resume with examples of similar projects you’ve worked on.

A reference of a client / company you’ve worked with in the past would be highly appreciated!
